Title: US Navy Declares Initial Operational Capability for Next-Gen F/A-18 Sensors
Description: The US Navy has formally declared Initial Operational Capability for the next-generation infrared sensors designed for the F/A-18 Super Hornet. The post US Navy Declares Initial Operational Capability for Next-Gen F/A-18 Sensors appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: Saab Opens UK Manufacturing Facility for Radars, Underwater Robotics
Description: Saab UK has officially opened a defense manufacturing facility in Fareham, Hampshire, to develop the Swedish firm’s radar systems and underwater robotics line. The post Saab Opens UK Manufacturing Facility for Radars, Underwater Robotics appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: US Marines Unveil 2025 Aviation Plan
Description: The US Marine Corps (USMC) has unveiled its 2025 Aviation Plan, introducing 'Project Eagle' as its core modernization strategy to enhance operational readiness. The post US Marines Unveil 2025 Aviation Plan appeared first on The Defense Post.
